title: Singapore
desc: Boasting a tropical climate and a multicultural population, Singapore is an island city-state and global financial hub. Pulling influence from its Chinese, Indian and Arabic heritage, Singapore is home to many eclectic tourist districts such as Chinatown or Little India. Wander around giant man-made solar flowers at the Gardens by the Bay or take a typical photo with the merlions for your Instagram. Cruise over to Sentosa Island on the Singapore Cable Car and behold the beautiful cityscapes below as you embark on your adventures in Singapore!
